ComicInfo.Summary: Old Habits Part 2: Sara and Ian attack Lord Nogawa and his Yakuza minions. When Ian kills Nogawa after promising Sara that he won't shed any more blood, Sara arrests him. Chilling with Gleason at the bar after the encounter, Sara gets the news that Jake is out of his coma.
